name: Yukiusa
description:
Control the snow rabbit "Yuki-Usa" to reach the top of the stage!

Cute ornaments will appear on the stage as Yuki-Usa bounces around.
Let's proceed while decorating the stage!

The snow bunnies bounce around so much that you may fall off the stage.
But that's no problem!
This game has a respawn function.
Don't give up and aim for the top!
